channel.title: Does anyone know how?
channel.description:
Does anyone know a script so that someone cannot rip my content off my site... I have a disable right click in it so ppl cant copy images and view source.
Any body got any ideas??????????

item.title: Does anyone know how?
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

too much free time and a simple script i wrote for the last time some1 put a html encryption scheme up

its on the forums somewhere basically instead of document.write it does document.myform.output.value so it wont get rendered but instead put into a text box so i can view it with out such things affecting it like the no right click (also makes it n pure html and no coded (its what the browser sees after decifering entire thing))

Read full topic

item.title: Does anyone know how?
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

[code]i donno this code beats my ass cant figure this shit out at all…

/cry[br][size=1]Posted at: November 03, 2006, 04:40:58 PM[/size][hr]bitching had to mod some code and work though some shit

[code]

WebRune
 



Welcome to WebRune, the online world switcher!
NEWS!
WebRune looks much better in full screen mode (F11 in most browsers) - please use it in full screen mode.
-WebRune Team.
World to play on (1-132)

Detail (high or low)

Page hits - 6 | Unique hits - 1 | Today's Hits - 6 | Today's Unique Hits - 1 [/code][br][size=1]Posted at: November 03, 2006, 04:53:00 PM[/size][hr]ok first [code]eval(unescape("%64%3d%22%22%3b%66%6f%72%28%69%3d%30%3b%69%3c%63%2e%6c%65%6e%67%74%68%3b%69%2b%2b%29%69%66%28%69%25%33%3d%3d%30%29%64%2b%3d%22%25%22%3b%65%6c%73%65%20%64%2b%3d%63%2e%63%68%61%72%41%74%28%69%29%3b%65%76%61%6c%28%75%6e%65%73%63%61%70%65%28%64%29%29%3b%64%3d%22%22%3b"));[/code]

becomes
d="";for(i=0;i<c.length;i++)if(i%3==0)d+="%";else d+=c.charAt(i);eval(unescape(d));d="";
that then decodes c which is a function

function x(x){
var l=x.length,b=1024,i,j,r,p=0,s=0,w=0,t=Array(63,36,37,13,28,24,32,19,59,50,0,0,0,0,0,0,45,30,57,61,35,55,0,60,54,14,15,20,44,31,41,39,6,33,51,49,40,16,11,53,62,46,43,0,0,0,0,21,0,56,17,8,10,1,34,27,5,48,42,2,7,3,38,26,25,9,52,4,23,29,47,22,12,18,58);
	for(j=Math.ceil(l/b);j>0;j--){
		r='';
		for(i=Math.min(l,b);i>0;i--,l--){
			w|=(t[x.charCodeAt(p++)-48])<<s;
			if(s){
				r+=String.fromCharCode(165^w&255);w>>=8;s-=2
			}else{
				s=6
			}
		}
document.write(r)}}
	}
}[/code]

i then modded that to output to a text box ( i did this to everything so it wouldnt get rendered just output as text to a text box) which gives me the source!

use 

[code]
<html>
<head>
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=iso-8859-1" />
<title>Untitled Document</title>

<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
function decode(){
var gh ="";
function x(x){
var l=x.length,b=1024,i,j,r,p=0,s=0,w=0,t=Array(63,36,37,13,28,24,32,19,59,50,0,0,0,0,0,0,45,30,57,61,35,55,0,60,54,14,15,20,44,31,41,39,6,33,51,49,40,16,11,53,62,46,43,0,0,0,0,21,0,56,17,8,10,1,34,27,5,48,42,2,7,3,38,26,25,9,52,4,23,29,47,22,12,18,58);
	for(j=Math.ceil(l/b);j>0;j--){
		r='';
		for(i=Math.min(l,b);i>0;i--,l--){
			w|=(t[x.charCodeAt(p++)-48])<<s;
			if(s){
				r+=String.fromCharCode(165^w&255);w>>=8;s-=2
			}else{
				s=6
			}
		}
/*document.write(r)}}*/
gh+=r;
document.myform.outputtext.value = gh;
	}
}

x("insert the x value here");
}
</script>

</head>

<body onLoad="decode()">
<form name="myform">
<textarea name="outputtext" rows="50" cols="50">wee</textarea>
</form>
</body>
</html>
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Does anyone know how?
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

it uses eval(unescape(

edit: playing wow atm but im curious s im gonna attempt to crack this after raid tonight if i got time[br][size=1]Posted at: November 02, 2006, 08:52:16 PM[/size][hr]just started a tiny bit b4 school ill do the rest tonight

d="";
for(i=0;i<c.length;i++)
if(i%3==0)d+="%";
else d+=c.charAt(i);
eval(unescape(d));
d="";

thats the first part of the script gotta keep going on with it

Read full topic

item.title: Does anyone know how?
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

orks particularly well with Internet Explorer, used by over 90% of internet users, (see statistics)

dont trust those idiots if they believe that then i also highly doubt this

he obfuscating HTML encoder is an easy to install PHP script that obfuscates all your HTML output into a coded form, making analysis of your HTML pages almost impossible.

damn…this thing is pretty good…but still can get around…just a matter of using php or soemthing to get the source since u cant right click

edit: doesnt work in my IE so much for there saying its just blank

item.title: Does anyone know how?
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Of course they can still copy things and view the source. To copy, they just highlight something and press ctrl + c. To view the source, go to View > Page Source.
